insert into tunesurge_users.ts_user_role(user_id, role_id, create_time, update_time, creator) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.roleId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.creator})

insert into tunesurge_users.ts_user_role(user_id, role_id, create_time, update_time, creator) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.roleId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.creator})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id) , role_id = values(role_id) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , creator = values(creator)
